term.title: bolometer

item.text: A detector constructed from a material having a large temperature coefficient of resistance. Absorption of radiation gives rise to a change in resistance. A bolometer is named according to its active component, e.g. thermistor bolometer, semiconductor bolometer, superconductor bolometer.
